description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe for building the X.Org X server, detailing metadata, dependencies, package configurations, and build instructions tailored for the Yocto Project/OpenEmbedded build system.

classes.name: bitbake.recipe
classes.description: A BitBake recipe for building the X.Org X server with various configuration options, dependencies, and packaged files.

methods.name: populate_packages
methods.description: Prepares runtime package dependencies based on the ABI version information retrieved via pkg-config, adding ABI-specific runtime provisions.
